about_the_game:
In Sentinel: Stones of Disruption, players take on the role of a highly advanced robot sent on a reconnaissance mission to a distant planet where a valuable crystal has been lost. However, upon arrival, they find themselves under attack by powerful aliens and rock golems who are determined to keep the magical crystal for them. Players must use all their skills and weapons to fight off these formidable enemies and recover the lost crystal, while navigating treacherous environments filled with hazards and traps.

Sentinel: Stones of Disruption is an action-packed roguelike shoot'em up, featuring fast-paced combat, procedurally generated levels, and a variety of weapons and power-ups to discover. With stunning visuals and challenging gameplay, Sentinel: Stones of Disruption is a must-play for fans of the genre. Will you be able to navigate the dangerous terrain, defeat the aliens, and recover the lost crystal, or will you succumb to the perils of the planet? The fate of the mission rests in your hands.

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 380 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i9
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: Sentinel: Stones of Disruption is a pulse-pounding sci-fi roguelike shoot'em up on a remote planet. Step into the metal shoes of a powerful robot on a mission to reclaim a stolen crystal from alien adversaries. Restoring this gem is crucial to bringing harmony back to a shattered world.
